titleStmt.title: An elegiacall commemoration of the pious life, and most lamented death, and funerals, of Mr. Josiah Shute, rector of the parish, of St. Mary Woolnoth in Lombard-Street. Who left us on the 13 of June. 1643.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the Yeare of our Lord, 1643.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
